app_description: An integrated platform that brings together accounting, human resources management, and project management in one place. Designed to help you organize your business, track your team, and achieve your goals efficiently and professionally.
email_verification: We have sent a 6-digit verification code to your email address. Please enter the code below to verify your account. If you do not find the email in your inbox, check your spam or junk folder. The code will expire soon, but you can request a new one after the countdown ends.
